version_description:
- We always listen to your feedback - PRO version now supports unlimited streaming from NAS and third party servers.
- This update also includes bug fixes and stability improvements.

- We always listen to your feedback - PRO version now supports unlimited streaming from NAS and third party servers.
- This update also includes bug fixes and stability improvements.

The latest Nero MediaHome streaming server has enabled ‘AI tags’, which featuring a world first local AI technology: the Nero AI Photo Tagger.
This update includes the support for Nero MediaHome 'AI Tags' and some improvement for device connection.

The latest Nero MediaHome streaming server has enabled ‘AI tags’, which featuring a world first local AI technology: the Nero AI Photo Tagger.
This update includes the support for Nero MediaHome 'AI Tags' and some improvement for device connection.

Now you can play YouTube videos to smart TVs! VIP users can of course get unlimited YouTube streaming, for free!
Note: Some copyright-protected videos only support playback on the mobile phone or tablet, not streaming. We will continue to improve the

Bug fixes and experience optimization

1. We have fixed the problem of streaming photos and music to Philips Smart TVs.
2. We have improved the performance.

Bug fixes and experience optimization

1. We have fixed the problem of streaming photos and music to Philips Smart TVs.
2. We have improved the performance.

We always adapt Nero Streaming Player PRO to the latest version to improve user experience.
1. Nero Streaming Player PRO is now compatible with iOS14, making it easier to use.
2. Nero Streaming Player PRO is now compatible with latest Nero MediaH
